void scan_text (FILE *InputFile, char *text)
 Scans a string from the file InputFile and stores in the string buffer text. The length of the string is defined as LENGTH.

 Scans a double from the file InputFile.

 Scans a unsigned long number from the file InputFile.
int scan_word (int StartPosition, char *FileLine, char *text)
 Scans a word from the string buffer FileLine, the starting position will be StartPosition, and store in text.
